title: Boyle County man dies after accidental shooting
content:
BOYLE CO., Ky. (WKYT) - Investigators say a man has died after an accidental shooting in Boyle County.
Police say Allen Ramsey, 29, died Wednesday afternoon at U.K. Hospital.
The Boyle County Sheriff's Office says Ramsey was shooting groundhogs at his farm on Tuggle Road earlier Wednesday. Deputies say that somehow, a bullet hit Ramsey in the stomach.
